Key Match Events: Cubs center fielder Pete Crow-Armstrong made an incredible play by scooping up a line drive and throwing out Jose Tena at second base.
Catcher Christian Bethancourt threw out CJ Abrams at second base.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs had a 5.2% chance of clinching a wild-card spot entering Saturday, an improvement from the 3.1% chance they had on Aug. 1.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Craig Counsell praised the team's defense, saying 'Trying to get [starter Javier Assad] through that sixth inning, PCA made an incredible play.'
